Since 2012, GoldenBeaverHosting.com is a web host and VPS provider. Dedicated to price-quality ratio, we provide quality services for those on a low budget. We believe that the web should remain cheap, reliable and accessible to everyones. We take care of our clients and you will never feel like if you are just a number.


4 locations in USA:

Los Angeles
Dallas
Chicago
Miami
